item.title: Clothes
item.description:
See the Clothes available in the server

Note: Male and Female are used as they are they apply explicitly to the relevant ped and will not show the same on the other ped.
So “Male_Hat_1_Blue” will likely be a different model on the Female Ped, however the same model may be available as a different model.

This is a GTA Limitation

Clothing items Complete

1 - Face Masks and other head items that aren’t hats
3 - Torsos, which means gloves etc - Images not on this site
